View and swap between different versions of your document templates within the {{< var validmind.platform >}}. Switch to a completely different template, or apply another version of your current template.

- When swapping templates, only the document structure is changed. Any modifications that you might have made to content is preserved inside each content block or section.
- If you are not sure which template or which version of a template your document is using, you can also check and compare between different templates and versions of templates.

::: {.attn}

## Prerequisites

- [x] {{< var link.login >}}
- [x] To swap between templates or template versions, more than one template or version must exist for that document type.[^1]
- [x] You are a [{{< fa code >}} Developer]{.bubble} or [{{< fa circle-check >}} Validator]{.bubble}, or assigned another role with sufficient permissions to perform the tasks in this guide.[^2]

:::

## View document templates

{{< include /guide/templates/_view-document-templates.qmd >}}

## Swap document templates

View templates applied to model documents or swap between templates or template versions:

1. In the left sidebar, click **{{< fa cubes >}} Inventory**.

2. Select a model or find your model by applying a filter or searching for it.[^3]

3. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **{{< fa file >}} Documents**.

4. Select the document you want to view the template for:

   - Click **{{< fa magnifying-glass >}} Search** to search for documents by keywords in the document title.
   - Click **{{< fa arrow-up-wide-short >}} Sort** to reorder the list using different criteria in ascending or descending order.[^4]

   ::: {.callout title="Note that searching and sorting of fields stack."}
   For example, if you first search by keyword for `ValidMind` without clearing that search, any additional sorting applied will only apply to the results returned by that initial search.

   :::

5. On your document's detail page, locate [document template]{.smallcaps}.

6. View the currently applied template and version, or swap to another template or version.

::: {.panel-tabset}

### View currently applied templates

a. Click on the named version of the template.

b. Select **{{< fa eye >}} View Template Details** to open the details for the template applied to that document.

### Swap between templates

a. Click on the named version of the template.

b. Select **{{< fa sync >}} Update Document Template** to swap to a different template or template version:

   - Under **[template]{.smallcaps}**, choose a new template to switch to.
   - Under **[version]{.smallcaps}**, choose a different version of the same template to switch to.

c. Review the differences between the switched templates or template versions to confirm that you want to apply those changes.

d. Click **Apply Changes to Template** to complete the swap.

:::



<!-- FOOTNOTES -->

[^1]: [Manage document types](manage-document-types.qmd)

[^2]: [Manage permissions](/guide/configuration/manage-permissions.qmd)

[^3]: [Working with the model inventory](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models)

[^4]:

   - **[title]{.smallcaps}** — Sort by title alphabetically.
   - **[type]{.smallcaps}** — Sort by document type alphabetically.
   - **[date created]{.smallcaps}** — Sort by creation date.
   - **[date updated]{.smallcaps}** — Sort by last update date.
